title: Project Item
description: A general representation of an item defined in the current project.

id.description: A unique identifier for this item.

name.description: The user-given name of this item.

type.description: A numeric value indicating the type of this item.

typeName.description: A string value indicating the type of this item.

parentId.description: The unique identifier of the parent of this item in the project hierarchy.

siteId.description: If this item has a location, this is the unique identifier of the site at which this item exists.

siteOrder.description: The order in which this site should be displayed in a list of sites.

siteName.description: If this item has a location, this is the name of the site at which this item exists.

buildingId.description: If this item has a location, this is the unique identifier of the building in which this item exists.

buildingOrder.description: The order in which this building should be displayed in a list of buildings.

buildingName.description: If this item has a location, this is the name of the building in which this item exists.

floorId.description: If this item has a location, this is the unique identifier of the floor on which this item exists.

floorOrder.description: The order in which this floor should be displayed in a list of floors.

floorName.description: If this item has a location, this is the name of the floor on which this item exists.

roomId.description: If this item has a location, this is the unique identifier of the room in which this item exists.

roomOrder.description: The order in which this room should be displayed in a list of rooms.

roomName.description: If this item has a location, this is the name of the room in which this item exists.

deviceOrder.description: The order in which this device should be displayed in a list of devices.

roomHidden.description: A flag indicating whether or not this room is hidden.

tempHidden.description: A flag indicating whether or not this item is hidden temporarily.

protocolId.description: The unique identifier of the protocol driver instance for this item.

protocolName.description: The name given to this item by the user and stored in the protocol driver state.  This is usually the user-visible name of this item.

protocolFilename.description: The name of the driver file that has been loaded to support this item.

model.description: The name of the model of this device.

control.description: A string value indicating the type of control interface to be used to control this device.

protocolControl.description: A string value indicating the additional control interfaces supported by the protocol driver for this device.
